unit_rules.name: Inescapable Death
unit_rules.text: Once per Battle Round, one unit with this ability may use the Overwatch strategem for 0 CP, even if that Strategem has already been used this Battle Round. Additionally, while using the Overwatch strategem, unmodified Hit rolls of 2+ are successful.

unit_rules.name: Multi-Threat Eliminator
unit_rules.text: After an enemy unit Shoots a friendly +Necrons+ unit within 3", this model can perform a Shoot action.
